LanguageData.CYB_SettingLabel_UnaffectedInTraitPool: Add Unaffected trait to trait pool
LanguageData.CYB_SettingDesc_UnaffectedInTraitPool: Whether the Unaffected trait should generate randomly on pawns, independently of the Asocial gene.
LanguageData.CYB_SettingDesc_MoveVanillaGenes: Moves some vanilla genes out of Miscellaneous to group them with related genes from this mod, eg Robust Digestion into the Diet category.
LanguageData.CYB_SettingDesc_ChangeMealStacking: Tighter restrictions on meal stacking by ingredient. If you have no herbivorous/carnivorous pawns and would prefer the vanilla logic, turn this off. NOTE: failure to restart after changing will cause errors and invisble meals.
LanguageData.CYB_SettingLabel_BundleSkinHairColors: Bundle skin and hair color genes
LanguageData.CYB_SettingDesc_BundleSkinHairColors: Combines skin and hair color genes into themed bundles to reduce clutter. To see the colors as separate genes, turn this setting off.
LanguageData.CYB_SettingsHeaderDesc_OffspringAffects: Use these toggles to control whether the non-standard means of reproduction below are affected by the Offspring line of genes, which force the carrier's children to be a specific xenotype.
LanguageData.CYB_SettingDesc_OffspringAffects_Asexual: Asexual reproduction that uses the Vanilla Expanded Framework mechanism. Includes Alpha Genes' Asexual Fission, and possibly others.
LanguageData.CYB_SettingLabel_OffspringAffects_AG_Par: Alpha Genes' Parasitic Stinger Implanter, Endogenes
LanguageData.CYB_SettingDesc_OffspringAffects_AG_Para: With this setting on, the chestburster babies generated from the corresponding parasitic stinger will be born with the genes of the Offspring-gene-specified xenotype, as endogenes regardless of whether that xenotype is normally heritable or not.
LanguageData.CYB_SettingLabel_OffspringAffects_AG_Par: Alpha Genes' Parasitic Stinger Implanter, Xenogenes
LanguageData.CYB_SettingDesc_OffspringAffects_AG_Para: With this setting on, the chestburster babies generated from the corresponding parasitic stinger will be born with the genes of the Offspring-gene-specified xenotype, as xenogenes regardless of whether that xenotype is normally heritable or not.
LanguageData.CYB_SettingDesc_NoOutlandGlimmer: The Glimmer xenotype relies on the mod Outland Genetics to provide most of its cosmetic genes. This setting enables a less-pretty but still functional version.
